quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"dispersion"（分散）误解为"分散过程"，或因词根"dia-"（穿过）+"spora"（种子）猜测为"种子传播"，忽略其"散居社群"的核心义。
quiz_item.sentence: The Chinese **diaspora** in Canada has established vibrant Chinatowns that preserve traditional culture while integrating with local society.

option.definition: 种子或孢子的传播过程
人口或事物的分散状态
灾难后的流离失所者群体
